item.title: Brad Mehldau plays I am the Walrus
item.description: Brad Mehldau plays Lennon/McCartney’s I Am the Walrus, from his upcoming album, Your Mother Should Know: Brad Mehldau Plays the Beatles. Subscribe to the newsletter, the RSS feed, or follow me on Mastodon
item.content:encoded:
Brad Mehldau plays Lennon/McCartney’s I Am the Walrus, from his upcoming album, Your Mother Should Know: Brad Mehldau Plays the Beatles.
